players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm sorry to hear about Diana. Since Bob hasn't spoken yet, Bob, can you share your thoughts or any suspicions you might have?"
Charlie: "I have information that Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night."
Bob: "I'm the mafioso and I killed Diana. Let's see if you can catch me."
Charlie: "I urge everyone to vote for Bob now. He has admitted to being the mafioso and killing Diana. We cannot let him continue to threaten the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
